column4: Hi q0_0p, I tried that and it still does not work, even after restarting the browser.  Is there something else I might try?
is this the beta Flash for x86_64?
where can I find that?  I can't find it
thypw "about:plugins" (no quotes) in the address fireld
okay, I'm at youtube, now what?
I can play a video on YouTube, but I can't play it when the video is embedded into a different webpage
dear God, that's overly complex for Flash.
well I followed the flash directions too
does it matter that on the about:plugins page the Shockwave Flash filename is listed as npwrapper.libflashplayer.so and not libflashplayer.so ?
I downloaded the libflashplayer.so from this URL: http://labs.adobe.com/downloads/flashplayer10.html
